## Sara Institute🚀 {background-color="#E9E9E9"}

-   Preference will be given to SC/ST/OBC **graduate** candidates .

-   Intake **30** students only.

-   It is founded under a **charitable trust.**

-   **Donations.**

## Education 🎓 {background-color="#E9E9E9"}

-   Completely **FREE** education for all the courses.

-   Total duration will be approx. **a year**.

-   Also **online sessions** by data science experts from industry as well as academics.

-   **No certificate.**

## Courses 📚 {background-color="#E9E9E9"}

-   R language:

    -   Data Visualization
    -   Data Wrangling

-   Statistics

-   Research Methods

-   GitHub

-   Quarto for dynamic content like website making, slide preparation, online books etc.

## 🏡 Accommodation {background-color="#E9E9E9"}

-   All classes will be **offline** at Terra City, Bhiwadi, Delhi NCR. [Google Map Link](https://goo.gl/maps/ukkG8B5LtwhdDRza8)

-   Students have to bear the cost of their **food and accommodation** (approx 3-4 thousand rupees per month).

## Important Dates {background-color="#E9E9E9"}

-   Registration last date: 13 Feb 2023

-   Result date: during last week of Feb 2023

    -   ⛳️**Confirm Travel Ticket before 15 March 2023**

-   Reporting date: during last week of March 2023

-   **Classes will start from the first week of April 2023**
